description:
Death stalks the city once again and when Saotome mysteriously disappears, the whispers of Boogiepop begin. After Moto catches a glimpse of Saotome’s ghost, she’s determined to find him and confess her feelings. But is it really him?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Portraits from Memory 記憶の肖像
Portraits from Memory: Kioku no Shouzou
